definition: to beat/to flog/to examine under torture
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

sentences.english: Shadow with the general belt XingShu apologise to see snow had been tortured.
sentences.chinese: 影佐將軍帶刑書媛來見已經被嚴刑拷打過的雪兒。

sentences.english: The subject of torture was depicted with a religious theme.
sentences.chinese: 嚴刑拷打被以一種宗教主題的形式描繪出來。

sentences.english: Facing too, the field of torture, JiDePing silence to die rather than give in.
sentences.chinese: 面對太田的嚴刑拷打，季德平沉默以對寧死不屈。

sentences.english: The soldiers endured many kinds of torture when they were in the hands of the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 這些士兵在敵人的手中遭受了各樣的嚴刑拷打。
巴林一名博主被嚴刑拷打。
